verses.verse: The Blessedness of Unity A Song of Ascents. (Gen 13.8; Heb 13.1) How very good and pleasant it is when kindred live together in unity!
(Ex 30.25; 39.24) It is like the precious oil on the head, running down upon the beard, on the beard of Aaron, running down over the collar of his robes.
(Lev 25.21; Deut 4.48; Ps 42.8) It is like the dew of Hermon, which falls on the mountains of Zion. For there the LORD ordained his blessing, life forevermore.
